website_summaries.verdict: A step up from standard playard sheets, this model has an extra touch of soft, quilted padding.
pros: Softer and less noisy than standard playard sheets
Comes in a variety of colors
cons: The sheet's water-resistant lining can melt in the dryer, so be sure to air dry

customer_reviews.title: Soft, quiet and the perfect sheet for a pack and play!
customer_reviews.text: We had another set of pack and play sheets that were so loud when our little one moved in the night. She would scratch at them and every little noise became so loud, it would wake her up. We found these sheets and they are perfect! Just enough padding to add a barrier and keep things quiet, and much softer than normal pack and play sheets. They’re a win-win in our book!! Also, she sleeps so much better with this sheet than her old ones! **If you found this review helpful, please mark as helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Abby WelchTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: ... since the included mattress is quite hard and seemed like it wouldn't be all that comfortable for baby
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to use with our Graco Pack 'n' Play since the included mattress is quite hard and seemed like it wouldn't be all that comfortable for baby. We didn't want to use a different mattress for safety reasons and this was a great alternative! Makes the mattress just a tad softer so it's a little closer to crib mattress firmness without being unsafe. Would definitely recommend these for anybody using a Pack 'n' Play for baby to sleep in.
customer_reviews.author: EJB

customer_reviews.title: Great price for high quality.
customer_reviews.text: Love these sheets. Great price for high quality. It fits the board that comes with a Grace pack n play and it also fits the mattress I purchased after the fact. Slightly padded like a thin quilt but not so bulky that it is dangerous for a baby to sleep on. These wash up like a pro. I wash mine weekly-ish for the past 8 months. They still look brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer D. Mosher

customer_reviews.title: Way too loose
customer_reviews.text: My photo is annoyingly blurry but still shows how I'm able to grab a handful of the sheet because there's soo much loose fabric! I tried pulling the edges further around the mattress, but the corners do fit snugly and correctly--it's like the middle is just all wrong. It's not so quilted that I feel it warrants the extra cost over a regular sheet anyway. I returned this product and purchased regular sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits Graco Pack n Play
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because I tried 2 other sheets for my graco pack n play and they were all to snug. So I bought this hoping since it's made by graco, that it would be a perfect fit. This is definitely a great fit! The reason why I marked down two stars is because-I don't think this sheet will last very long and I have to let it air dry, and second, I have only had this for a week and I have already noticed white stuffing material coming out of this sheet.
customer_reviews.author: Dan McWhorter

customer_reviews.title: Quilted sheet, not just a flat pad
customer_reviews.text: Like the fitted sheet I had purchased, the elastic was so tight that it caused the mattress pad to curl up and would not stretch out to the corners of the "crib". From looking at item carefully, I was expecting to get a quilted FLAT mattress PAD. I turned out to be a quilted sheet. In other review, I said I arranged to get a 1" thick piece of foam from neighbor, cut it to size, to enable the 2 sheets to flatten out as needed. This provided the added buffer needed to make this a comfortable sleeping area.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: No holes for Velcro straps on pad!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Graco says on its pack & plays to make sure the pad is secured to the pen but they make a sheet that doesn't have holes to insert the Velcro tabs through! WTF! I put the sheet on the pad w/ out the tabs velcroed down & the sheet bunches the pad causing a 3in gab around the edges, not very safe. I'm keeping the sheets because the pad is noisy when my little one rolls over at night but I'm gonna have to finish graco's job & sew in holes for the Velcro straps to go through.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than Graco Playard Fitted Sheet
customer_reviews.text: We bought this with the Graco Playard Fitted Sheet as an alternate to use on our Graco Pack 'n Play. The quilted version is fitted and once on is nice and snug. It has a slight padding to it which makes the hard board that comes with the Pack 'n Play more comfortable, but not enough padding for a comfy mattress-like feel for naps. We do not use this product with a mattress--only the flat, foldable board that comes with the Pack 'n Play. In my opinion the Quilted Playard Sheet is worth the few extra dollars compared to the fitted sheet, which was very loose and very thin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I've already washed it 3 times and it still looks like new.
customer_reviews.text: I was a little concerned reading some of the reviews about it not fitting/shrinking/falling apart. As soon as I got it I read the care instructions to wash in cold water and hang dry. I did that and no issues. I think reading care.instructions would have saved a lot of the reviewers some trouble. Another complaint was that it fit too snuggly. I'm using this in my Graco pack n play, so that.might make a difference, but it fits perfectly. You wouldn't want it any looser for safety's sake if a child is sleeping on it. I've already washed it 3 times and it still looks like new.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Nice item, nice price!  Buy at own Risk, however!
customer_reviews.text: Nice quilting which adds altitude padding to the plastic covered pack and play mat. I also use a sheet but don't think you would have to. Though all this is true, after using this quilted sheet several times, I noticed the bottom pad of the pack and play was buckling,Rising up in the middle. I phones Graco and they told me this quilted sheet was causing my problem, they had no more bottom sections to send me and I should call Amazon about this sheet which Amazon should not sell for this pack and play. This is a Graco named product sold to be used with this particular pack and play. So who is wrong here??
customer_reviews.author: Gramma

customer_reviews.title: Well Made and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are great sheets that fit the Pack 'N Plays well. I have two of them, for visiting grandchildren, and they are the best sheets I've found. They are sturdy enough to not bunch up, yet the material is soft enough to be comfortable for baby. I highly recommend this sheet. They hold up well in the wash. I was happy that I was also able to get a good deal on them. Mrs. K
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: approved pad cover for Graco pack n play
customer_reviews.text: This is made by Graco specifically for the pack n play. That's a huge deal because if it isn't made by Graco, then it could be a suffocation hazard to your baby. Its well padded and very durable. I noticed the colors are all different prices so click around to find the best bargain color! :) hint for other grandmas: its good to have two of these in case of a diaper leak!
customer_reviews.author: kelleyn

customer_reviews.title: Love love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It fits perfectly, just fold your pack n play mat into half to fit it on. Soft enough that my son didn't hate the pack n play sleeping but firm enough that I didn't worry about his safety more than normal (for a new parent) . Would totally buy again. Honestly haven't needed to wash it yet, will try the recommendations of other reviewers first for wash/setting. Material feels like something that might shrink. Ours hasn't stained or anything, but I usually have a receiving blanket overtop just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: These are a must-have!
customer_reviews.text: Where were these playpen mattress covers when my son was little? haha! So glad I purchased these before my daughter was born. So easy to just take the cover off and wash. It has kept the playpen mattress in great condition by helping protect from spills, etc. This would be a great shower gift for any momma! Something you don't realize you need but LOVE to have!
customer_reviews.author: JWilder

customer_reviews.title: Get more zzzzs!
customer_reviews.text: These have turned our pack n plays into a semi-permanent sleep situation for our twins. We didn’t want to blow money on bassinets that would only last a few months; but two full size cribs won’t fit in our bedroom. Babies do best sharing a room with mom, so we went the PNP route. These are soft and comfy without posing a suffocation risk! The babies sleep much better on them than they do a regular thin sheet. They’re definitely worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Clapp

customer_reviews.title: So soft but too tight!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is great fabric; it’s super soft, a little padded to make our Graco pack n play mattress a little more comfortable than cardboard. BUT it is too tight!!!! The sheet is perfect size, but the elastic on the backing is crazy tight and makes the 4 separate boards inside the mattress all overlap. So we snipped the elastic in 8 different spots on the back side of the sheet and that seemed to help. Hopefully it will because I love the fabric!
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: 1/2 the price comp. to retail
customer_reviews.text: This fitted sheet fits my Grace pack'n'play perfectly. The fabric is very soft and it is quilted with and thin inner layer of batting for a bit of cushion on the hard base mattress in the pack'n'play, without being too fluff to be bulky and hazardous to a infant. It is a fitting "sheet", so no worry about baby getting it loose to become a hazard either. I was going to make my own version of this but then found it in a store (B'sRUs) for $17 and some change. I thought is check to see if I could find it here on Amazon for cheaper. Sure enough I did! It's nearly half the price here! I love Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Extendy Bendy

customer_reviews.title: Buy direct from a store
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sheet on Amazon. My mom bought the same sheet from Wal-Mart two days later for our pack n play at her house. Sheets were the same price. Washed both sheets in the same machine, same detergent, hung both to dry. The one purchased here looks terrible. Fabric is pilled on top & underneath, seams have thread hanging loose, it looks like it's already worn out. The one purchased from Wal-Mart looks perfect. Lesson learned. If the prices are the same I'll be purchasing from store sites from now on.
customer_reviews.author: heather hunt

customer_reviews.title: Do yourself a favor and get a pack and play mattress
customer_reviews.text: If you have a pack and play you need to get a pack and play mattress! Not just the little mattress like pad thing that it comes with you need to buy an actual pack and play mattress. You won’t regret it. After doing that you need a sheet for it and typical crib sheets do not fit the pack and play mattress so this sheet is also a must. It’s great soft fits snug and easy to clean. Do it you and your child will love it. This does not fit on the mattress pad that comes with the pack and play. This is meant for the mattress that’s sold separately.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Berke

customer_reviews.title: Great waterproof sheet
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has severe acid reflux, and throws up several times a night. I used these for the bassinet part sheet on her pack and play. The pack and play looks brand new when you take these off. Ive heard don't throw them in the dryer, because of the material... but I've never had a problem. I accidentally did it a couple of times, and just went ahead and started doing it! We love them.
customer_reviews.author: Momof3InTN

customer_reviews.title: Best sheet for pack-n-play
customer_reviews.text: We use our pack-n-play as a crib at my parent's house and I wanted something that fit nicely, but was also soft for my little one to sleep on all night. This sheet fit the bill perfectly! The quilting adds an extra layer without being loose or too soft and it is also extra absorbent in case they spit up or drool. I also think it helps deaden that thump sound the hard pad makes when they kick or hit their fists against it, which is nice. If your little one is used to a real crib and mattress, this sheet will help them sleep in a pack-n-play.
customer_reviews.author: Kd P.

customer_reviews.title: Tight fitting, don’t pull up.
customer_reviews.text: Tight fit on the pack n play. It wraps around the pad insert and sit on the Velcro straps. So you can’t attach the pad to the base of the pack n play. They are very soft and easy to clean. Not too heavy for the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Fits graco pack N play
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these sheets to fit a LX Graco pack N play. They are thicker then regular sheets and nice to have to cover over the "mat" that comes with the pack in play. They do shrink in the wash some which was a little disappointing, but have held up pretty well. They were used everyday for about 2 months and now are used when we visit family out of town.
customer_reviews.author: redDemonromance

customer_reviews.title: Decent but not durable
customer_reviews.text: I liked that this was a bit thicker than others and felt soft. Be careful washing it though. It doesn't take much to tear the lining. Putting it in a lingerie bag and washing on delicate helped.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great color (it is a little darker than the picture ...
customer_reviews.text: Great color (it is a little darker than the picture - more charcoal gray) and fit my Graco Pack 'n Play well. It does fit snugly but that's the way I wanted it. I machine-washed and air-dried the sheet and have no issues. It's a great addition to the included pad on the Pack 'n Play and it gives a little extra cushion without adding something large to pack.
customer_reviews.author: Joy S

customer_reviews.title: My baby didn't like the vinyl feel of the pack and play mattress ...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a little nicer than a standard sheet. My baby didn't like the vinyl feel of the pack and play mattress and this did the trick. It definitely fits tight though and can cause the mattress seams to bunch a bit. Even with that I haven't had any issues and use the sheet all the time. It also works as a nice barrier to prevent spit up from getting on the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy sheet for pack-n-play
customer_reviews.text: These are great sheets. Our daughter slept on these for the first few months in our room. It gave a nice little padding to the hard mat. I didn't have any issues with shrinkage, I air dried these but then got lazy and would dry them on low and they did just fine in the dryer. I would suggest buying 2 so that you have one clean version should something happen in the middle of the night. These are the best option I found for when your baby will be sleeping in a pack-n-play for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So happy I found these!! Ordered 2 and I'm very pleased!!
customer_reviews.text: Had put 2 "sheets" into my cart. Within 24 hours, they went from $7.00 each to $24!!!! Each!!! Said "screw that", deleted them, searched and found these. Ordered 2. Washed them immediately upon arrival. They fit perfectly!!! They are very soft and padded and well made! Baby likes to kick her feet and is no longer hitting the hard pressed board that is at the bottom of the pack n play! Paid $7.78 each and they are worth every penny and more!! Very, very happy!! Highly recommend for all baby's comfort!
customer_reviews.author: Someone

customer_reviews.title: it should be a perfect fit and it isn't
customer_reviews.text: Considering this is made by Graco, the same company that manufactured my pack 'n play, it should be a perfect fit and it isn't. I washed in cold water and hung to dry and it is still too small and makes the basinet pad "rumple" which won't allow for a completely flat surface for my baby to sleep. Graco needs to modify the sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Baby prefers this one over a plain sheet
customer_reviews.text: The quilted sheet is softer than a plain sheet but still safe for sleep. My 3 month old falls asleep on it immediately when we put her down versus a plain sheet where she would instantly wake up upset because it was uncomfortable. I also like that it has an elastic back.
customer_reviews.author: A. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Fits well
customer_reviews.text: My 9 month old sleeps all night long in his crib at home but wakes up several times a night in the pack n play. We got this along with a jersey sheet to make it a little comfier. It adds a layer of softness and makes the mattress less noisy and he slept better with it. However, I wouldn’t use this before a kid is rolling over well by himself. It makes it a little too soft to make it a safe sleep space for a baby that doesn’t move his head around well yet.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Universal fit and purposeful
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this pack-n-play quilted sheet. It serves its purpose in creating a soft nap space for the baby, as well as protecting the playard mattress from wetness damage. It is super fitted so I do not need to worry about the sheet slipping off! The sheet also fits universally, as I have a Baby Trend pack-n-play, versus the Graco that this is manufactured for.
customer_reviews.author: Christi

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my baby's Graco pack and play, but it is so tight that it backs the mattress curl up and potentially make the mattress snap in and close in on it self. Im not taking any chances. Sheets should be snug but not so tight that it makes the bed fold in and close on itself. Very disappointed. I ended up ordering the Little One's Pad (mattress sheet for the pack and play maytress) which fitted perfectly (fitted snugly and does not fold the mattress) and still is soft.
customer_reviews.author: L.

customer_reviews.title: Saving my Baby’s Hair
customer_reviews.text: My daughter likes to rub her head back and forth against the Pack n Play Mat as she falls asleep. Unfortunately, I realized WAY too late that the friction was rubbing her hair off. This cover arrived quickly and was really easy to wash. Washing it did not soften it too terribly much, though. It does look nice and was really easy to put on.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: A must have for pack n plays!
customer_reviews.text: After setting up our pack n play, I noticed the pad wasn’t the most comfortable! However, it’s not safe to switch mattresses or add a supplemental mattress to it, so after researching, I decided to buy this and am very happy I did! It’s easy to put on, wash and helps make the pad more comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Brigette

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit play yard- too big
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t fit our play yard exactly (it’s too big) which is honestly the only reason I ordered this. It also doesn’t look like the color pictured- it’s a yellowish-tan and not the more blush tone shown. Mostly disappointed in the size - otherwise it’s soft and would’ve been great
customer_reviews.author: Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Soft and fits as expected
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice sheet that fits as expected and is very soft. Ive machine washed it a bunch of times and the quality has held up well. My only issue is that a big spit up episode left a white stain on it that i havent been able to get out. Im not sure if its more baby related or product related but i never had this issue with a different sheet.
customer_reviews.author: Mukaking

customer_reviews.title: Works great in pack n play
customer_reviews.text: Sheet is super plush and helped my newborn get better sleep than just a standard players sheet. The “mattress” in the pack n play is very firm and doesn’t seem at all comfortable, so I feel like this sheet really helped provide extra cushion. It’s easy to clean and looks very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle W

customer_reviews.title: Stone gray is very dark!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sheet. Fits the pack n play perfectly. The only thing I will warn about is the color. I purchased the stone gray sheet and in the picture, it looked like a light to medium gray. In reality, it is a very dark gray, not at all like in the picture. That was disappointing, but not worth my time to deal with exchanging. It is very soft, washes easily, fits like a glove. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: machine washable
customer_reviews.text: It's a tight fit on the pack n play mattress, but it works fine. I wash it in cold water and dry it on low heat (even though the tag says to hang it to dry). I can tell that drying it in the dryer will eventually wear out the batting on the back, but I think by the time that happens my baby will have outgrown the pack n play anyway. I like the little bit of extra cushion from the quilting. It adds a little softness and doesn't seem unsafe at all.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: They're very soft and I like the quilting because it adds a little cushion to ...
customer_reviews.text: My son has been sleeping in the bassinet part of his pack n play since he was born and we've been using these sheets the whole time. They're very soft and I like the quilting because it adds a little cushion to an otherwise pretty hard surface for him to sleep on. They wash up well, although they did shrink somewhat with the first washing. They still fit--just barely--but it is hard to get them on and off of the bassinet insert.
customer_reviews.author: InvisibleGirl

customer_reviews.title: Soft Sheets
customer_reviews.text: I am currently using our pack and play as a bassinet. These sheets are nice and soft and fit the pack and play nicely. Cleaning them can be a little difficult because you must wash them on delicate cycle and let them air-dry or the backing of the sheet will start to degrade.
customer_reviews.author: CityGal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for Pack n Play
customer_reviews.text: This is the first mattress cover that I have found that truly fits the Pack n Play. Unlike crib sheets, there is no excess material which is dangerous for infants. It is extremely soft to the touch also. I recommend this mattress cover for the Pack n Play.
customer_reviews.author: Megg

customer_reviews.title: Very soft, makes the play-yard mattress be more comfortable and warm for baby
customer_reviews.text: I quite like this, as it has really made a difference in my baby's comfort and sleep quality in her convertible pack-n-play. It fits perfectly. No problems washing or cleaning, but I have been careful to let it air dry as others have suggested. It is a little more expensive than a regular fitted sheet, but it is quite reasonable in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: afig

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, dried quickly.
customer_reviews.text: I purhased this for a trip to Oregon. We used the pak n play for our 1 year old's maij place to sleep. This quilted sheet made it a much more cozy place for her to sleep. I added a small blanket underneath to add more padding but the quilted sheet worked great.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Will ruin your mattress
customer_reviews.text: I loved this sheet at first. It’s very soft and easy to clean. One day I noticed the mattress was somehow smaller and there was a big lump in the middle. The panels of the mattress were buckling inward and had become warped. This sheet is too small and ruined the mattress that comes with the pack and play.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Material a bit rough for baby
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to add some cushion to the hard material on the playpen since we can't safely put a mattress in there. It wasn't as cushiony as I wanted it to be and then I'd also have to go buy a sheet that fits on top because the material is too rough for a baby. So just be prepared to buy another sheet to cover this.
customer_reviews.author: Yaya

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a must for any Graco Pack n Play!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these, one from BuyBuyBaby and one from Amazon(this was after spending double at the store). I got this because my son needed a bit of cushion in order to nap. This is a fitted sheet/comforter that is thick enough to provide cushion but thin enough as to not pose a health risk. The quality is there and the fit is just great. My only issue is that these aren't waterproof, but other than that, my wife and I love this for our 6 month baby.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Like any fitted sheet though
customer_reviews.text: Soft and fits the Pack’n’Play well. Prefer the quilted to the flat sheet since it adds a bit more cushion. Like any fitted sheet though, it is challenging to fold, especially after washing. Once folded though, I am able to fit it in a large ziplock and store it within the storage bag of the Pack’n’Play.
customer_reviews.author: Rainier Pinca

customer_reviews.title: Favorite pack n play sheet
customer_reviews.text: I love these sheets. I have bought 3 of them over the last 2 years. We have a couple pack n plays (grandparents houses, cabin, travel) and I have this sheet for all 3 of them! They're nice with the extra padding and they fit really well onto the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Z

customer_reviews.title: but it’s fine, and goes well with my pack and play
customer_reviews.text: Bought to add a little padding to the standard pack and play “bed” for my two granddaughters. Not a lot of cushion, but I guess that is for safety reasons. Fits perfectly. I haven’t washed it yet, but will definitely use cold water and maybe hang to dry to avoid any chance of shrinkage. It’s a little darker grey than I expected, but it’s fine, and goes well with my pack and play.
customer_reviews.author: Roxie

customer_reviews.title: Great sheet, it helps to soften the hard mattress ...
customer_reviews.text: Great sheet, it helps to soften the hard mattress in a pack-in-play. I've washed it several times with no shrinkage. Would recommend to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: M. McIntire

customer_reviews.title: Great quilted sheet!
customer_reviews.text: We're using this in the playpen that my daughter is sleeping in and it makes the cooler, harder mat much softer and comfy for her. I've washed it several times and it's held up nicely. Definitely would buy again and recommend for anyone whose little one is sleeping in the playpen. Fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: ChellyB

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with Quick Connect Pack N Plays!
customer_reviews.text: This fitted sheet would be great...but make sure it’s compatible with your pack n play. The description states it fits “most” pack n plays, so I purchased one not realizing it wouldn’t fit mine. If you have a Quick Connect Pack N Play, this sheet will be too big! I wish it was stated in the item description that it’s not compatible with those models, instead of the very vague statement that they used. Apart from the sheet being too big, I will say that the quality is really nice and I’m hoping to find the same sheet in the size I need.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Life saver!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like the idea of my baby sleeping on the pack n play surface without anything, plus it was so noisy when she’d move at night. I was using a sheet but it was annoying trying to keep the sheet fitted. I found this and was skeptical to buy it due to some reviews but it’s perfect for the Graco pack n play. Easy to put on, doesn’t make noise when she moves at night, and feels much more comfortable than the original surface.
customer_reviews.author: Jgirl

customer_reviews.title: Works but isn’t the best quality
customer_reviews.text: This has worked well for the pack and play at my parents house which doesn’t get used too much. I could see after many washings that the material might start to have some issues. It doesn’t make our Graco mattress munch up like the other one I bought by a different brands.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase. Fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: Actually ended up buying another one. Love the little cushion it has to it. Would recommend this over the thin pack n play sheet, although we do own both. If your looking to purchase just the thin sheet I’d check at Burlington if there’s one near you. They usually have some there for a little cheaper. The plush one is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Flores

customer_reviews.title: Great fitted sheet!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, the material is nice and the quilted texture makes it feel soft on the hard pack and play “mattress”. It fit perfectly in my graco pack n play. Looks great, would buy again. Price was decent, not much more than the thinner sheets but feels like better quality. Did not shrink in dryer!
customer_reviews.author: DeeDee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: This sheet fits my standard pack n play perfectly. Super soft material that washes up well, and I love the light plushness the quilted top gives while still maintaining a firm safe sleep surface (if that is a purpose you will use yours for) . Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ali Mac

customer_reviews.title: Do you put a mattress in a Pack 'n Play???
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research and for a newborn , less padding is better for safety concerns. I felt I needed to at least put some sort of mattress in the Pack 'n Play and this one is custom made for the dimensions of it. I'm sure he will be very comfortable and it looks very hand washable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than the regular pack n play sheets
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this yet because my baby is due in a couple weeks...I really like the quality of this product though. The regular sheets for the pack n play didn't seem very soft and we're very thin material. The quilted sheets have a little thickness to them and the material doesn't feel like sand paper. I only purchased one but I do plan on purchasing more since we will be using the pack n play in our bedroom as a bassinet.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Pearsall

customer_reviews.title: Overall Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product hoping it would add some cushion to our pack n play mattress for my daughter. It does add some cushion, but wasn't exactly what I was hoping for. We kept it because it helps a little, but if you are really looking to soften something by a decent amount, I would probably get something else.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Great pack n play sheet!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this pack n play sheet. It fits our standard pack play perfectly. It has elastic on all four sides and it’s thick and soft. If you are looking for a great deal this would be one. I will purchase more if I have the need. Also we washed it but didn’t dry it. It’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: T Riley

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected but the description is correct.
customer_reviews.text: Its not that thick, its just a glorifed fitted sheet. Just dont get it to pad your hard pack and play because its not going to give any cusion. I suggest get it as a simple fitted sheet and dont have any expectations. I give it a four because it is as describe, and it looks like the picture. I placed a blanket underneathe it for back support.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: This works for home use but we couldn't use it ...
customer_reviews.text: This works for home use but we couldn't use it in our daycare pack-n-play. Rules here state that it needs to be secured on the underside with velcro or ties but there are no loops/holes to do this. Its a little padded but fits snugly and gives a little cushion to the cardboard pack-n-play bottoms.
customer_reviews.author: Cortez5

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and so soft
customer_reviews.text: This fit my full size Graco pack n play mattress perfectly. No bunching, bubbling or looseness. It's very soft and the color was exactly as pictured. My little one will finally sleep in the bassinet of the play pen now that the mattress is softer. I can't vouch for it's water resistance though. We haven't encountered that problem yet. It has only been washed once so far but seems like it will hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Icicle

customer_reviews.title: Thick comfortable sheet for pack n play!
customer_reviews.text: I initially purchased the plain cotton mattress covers that are sort of like a big pillow case for the pack n play. They seem very flimsy and thin. When I received this sheet I was pleasantly surprised. It's thick and soft and has a waterproof backing. It seems like it's more comfortable for my son to sleep on as well. Wish I would've just purchased this sheet instead of the others.
customer_reviews.author: KKTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Perfect except for ...
customer_reviews.text: Our baby girl loves this and it provides just enough extra cushion on her pack n play mat for when she sleeps. The only negative is based on other reviews that it fell apart easily in the dryer. As a result, we’ve only hung dry the sheet as a precautionary measure do laundry must be done in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of these we bought for our pack n play, so we are able to switch back and forth when we throw them in the washer. The material is soft and adds a bit of comfort to the pack n play. It is easy to wash, and has held up well so far over about three months of frequent washing. The material has not faded either. We do wash it on a cold cycle normally.
customer_reviews.author: CeCe 2016

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this Playard sheet! We purchased this to use on an older Pack n Play borrowed during a trip to Florida. The gray color is nice looking and the thickness of the quilting was pleasantly surprising. This was her first time sleeping away from home and in anything other than her bassinet, which has a comfortable mattress. My 3 month old daughter slept better on this trip than she ever has at home and I’d like to think the sheet had a lot to do with it! Would definitely repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Pre

customer_reviews.title: Love it’s quilted cushion
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this for pack n play I was shocked that the pack n play didn’t come with a cover and I founded this one online hoping it would fit and it did ! I love that it’s mashine washable and quilted so it’s soft and a bit comfier for baby to sleep on. I got the pink one for my little girl.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy*B

customer_reviews.title: Very Pretty and fits well!
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and the softness of this quilted pack and play sheet. It washes well, and didn't seem to shrink. It is a tight fit - which I suppose is safest for baby, but it is a bit difficult to get on without unsnapping the mattress. But I still like it a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Donna W

customer_reviews.title: Fits great on Nooks, not so good on bigger pack n plays
customer_reviews.text: Pros: the padding on this is a great extra layer for baby. Cons: this didn't really fit our Gracco standard sized pack n play. It was incredibly hard to put on - I eventually had to snip two of the fitted corners (on the underside) to give it enough slack to go onto the pack n play. I did not shrink it either - this is how it fit straight out of the package. It fits great on our gracco Nook pak n play, but the standard size pack n play is a struggle.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: These sheets fit the Graco pack'n'play mat perfectly (the one it comes with, not the 3" mattress you can buy separate). Some reviews said they cause the mat to bunch up, but I did not have this issue. They don't provide much additional cushion, so they are fine for baby to sleep on without worrying about suffocation. I have washed them with no shrinkage, but as per other reviews I have not tried them in the dryer, but they didn't take very long to air dry. Would give 5 stars if I could machine dry without worries.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Love - best sheet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sheet for our pack n play, along with some other cheaper sheets. But the cheaper ones just dont compare. I wish I had just bought a couple of these. This sheet is thicker than a regular sheet and much better quality. I feel like these must be more comfortable for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Welch

customer_reviews.title: Won't lay flat
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product but for some reason it won't lay flat. I was comfortable enough to let my baby sleep on it for a weeks, but it was not flat enough to not make my want to check to make sure her face wasn't on it.
customer_reviews.author: Tamika Boyett

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I purchased a few of these! They work very well with my Graco playard. They hold up in the wash (cold water, Dreft detergent, no fabric softener, delicate cycle, very delicate dryer cycle). The fit is perfect and they’re a breeze to take on and off. Great price, and the Stobe matches my playard perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kendall B.Top Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Great for Disney baby pack-n-play
customer_reviews.text: Love this cover! We have it on our Disney brand pack-n-play. It is a very flat pad and this sheet fits it well. It gives the bed a much softer feel. Our baby doesn’t slide around with this cover on. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sara E

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!
customer_reviews.text: I really like it! I needed it to add padding on the hard pack and play mattress so my baby could sleep in it when we go out of town. I still had to put a thick blanket underneath it, but it definitely added some padding.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Conrad

customer_reviews.title: Love the cream color
customer_reviews.text: Fairly soft, adds some minimal padding to the pack n play floor mat. Stains wash off easily. I can see it deteriorating in the dryer over time though, the backside is made of something that does not look dryer friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: It fits and I'm happy.
customer_reviews.text: It fit my pack and play mattress very snug and adds a fair amount of cushioning to it without making it softer than it should be for an infant. The fact that i could cover the original green mattress was enough for a couple stars in my book.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: It was better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something that would add a little bit of padding to the Pack N Play, as well as be less cool to the touch. This sheet does both. It fits snugly, especially after washing and drying (I accidentally put it in the dryer, and unlike some other reviewers' experiences, it still fit fine, though pretty tightly) and is VERY soft. The padding isn't excessive, but the material is very nice to touch, almost like a micro-flannel. It's great for the cool nights when standard cotton sheets can feel very cold. I'm pleased and would buy it again if I need another.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole in CA

customer_reviews.title: Fits Cosco well
customer_reviews.text: This provided extra cushioning to our Cosco play yard's hard mat allowing us to use it temporarily as a crib in our bedroom until we moved the little one into his own room. The fabric itself was very soft and came clean easily in the washing machine after being spit up on several times.
customer_reviews.author: Jeela

customer_reviews.title: Graco Pack n Play Quilted Playard Sheet
customer_reviews.text: These quilted placard sheets are worth their weight in gold! They fit tight and smooth. They provide just a little more comfort and padding to those playard "mattresses". The sheets wash easily, don't shrink and don't pill. I recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: shopper1A

customer_reviews.title: More cozy sleeping space.
customer_reviews.text: This sheet makes the pack and play a little bit softer to sleep on. We keep it in the top of the folded crib because it's the most cozy. Nice tight fit and still perfect after many many washes.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Marie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in quality but it still works.
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought this was going to help my 6m old sleep better by offering some padding... But in reality, it is only slightly thicker than a regular fitted sheet. Having to hang to dry is time consuming, but if washed before lunch, it is dry by dinner time. I was very disappointed to see a 3" hole along the seam after the first wash (on delicate and hung to dry), but thankfully I have a sewing machine and was able to fix it myself. It is not a very high quality product, but it works.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M.

customer_reviews.title: This quilted sheet is excellent. A Pack 'n Play mattress by itself is ...
customer_reviews.text: This quilted sheet is excellent. A Pack 'n Play mattress by itself is far from comfortable - it's cold plastic and hard as a rock. This quilted sheet makes it just soft and cozy enough without being a danger to my little one. He slept in the Pack 'n Play for most of the first several months of his life. I wish I'd had two because he always slept so much worse whenever this one was in the wash!
customer_reviews.author: K. Howard

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Soft & durable. We bought this is gray and tan to swap out between washings. Fits the pack n play mattress well and adds a little extra cushion for baby. Only thing that could make this better is water resistance for the drool my child produces. The gray hides any staining better & isn't a pet hair magnet when the cats decide to investigate when baby's not inside.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn (C.)

customer_reviews.title: Fits Great
customer_reviews.text: This sheet fits perfect on the mattress pad in my Gracco pack n play. It is snug so it doesn't move or get loose while my son is sleeping. I've been washing it in hot water and it hasn't shrunk or faded.
customer_reviews.author: P Witty

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for pack and play
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure if I was going to like this when i ordered it, but so glad I did. Love the quiltiness of it and it hugs the pack and play matress so much better than a sheet, giving it just a little extra cush
customer_reviews.author: Lara831

customer_reviews.title: Much more comfortable now
customer_reviews.text: This fitted sheet has made the Pack & Play mattress much more comfortable for our baby. It took away that "scratchy" feeling and sound. I also like that I can easily take it off to remove crumbs or to wash it. It goes on easily and nicely; there's no bulkiness and it fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: ECasper16

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Pack 'n Play
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect as it provides more padding on the very firm surface of our pack 'n play. I don't feel as bad laying our son in it as without it....the surface is really hard. Easy to wash too.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Quilted, brushed cotton - nice soft layer between baby and the mattress
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of this item. I bought one for my daughter and then one for myself (grandma's house) for our Graco Pack 'n Plays. It fits any standard Graco Pack 'n Play. It is slightly quilted and a brushed cotton, giving a nice soft layer between baby and the mattress (not too soft to be a SIDS concern). I had purchased a regular percale sheet, prior to this and it was just too rough and thin. This sheet is perfect. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Loz1217

customer_reviews.title: Very snug fit, perfect for pack n play mattress
customer_reviews.text: This quilted sheet fit super snug. It is not like a traditional fitted sheet that fits over a box-shaped mattress. It is meant strictly for a pack n play mattress (the one included in the playard), which is very thin (less than an inch of depth), and so because of the stitching and tight elastic, it will not fit over anything thicker than the pack n play mattress alone. So for what it is it's great, but I intend to add some extra padding for my baby to sleep on so this won't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie C

customer_reviews.title: Safe, yet cozy sheet!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a sheet that added a little extra cushion without making it unsafe (per SIDS guidelines). This sheet is perfect. Soft, well made and fits perfectly. My son has reflux and spits up constantly so we got 5 of these sheets to get us through the week. To ensure it lasts, we wash it on cold and then air dry (it dries quickly!).
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect We were having the kiddo lay right on the pack and play we realized its not easy to clean. These fit our graco pack n play perfect they have elastic all the way around and hold well. Also flatten the base they are a little thicker and absorb the wonderful baby things well. Bought two so I could have one in the wash and one on the pack and play.
customer_reviews.author: Zero73

customer_reviews.title: Polyester not cotton
customer_reviews.text: Purchased specifically because it was listed as cotton. It is polyester. Due to an urgent need for a visiting infant the following day, I had to keep it and pay for it despite the inaccurate description. May work for others but deserves this rating from me.
customer_reviews.author: Zooey

customer_reviews.title: Just what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: Fits great, adds warmth and comfort to pack n plays piece of cardboard mattress. Does cover the Velcro.
customer_reviews.author: Tkl_harper

customer_reviews.title: Nice cushiony sheet for pack n play
customer_reviews.text: Felt bad last time my great nephew was here & needed a nap in the pack n play, only had pink sheets for my granddaughter lol so I bought this same one that I have in pink in gray for the next time Riot needs a nap at my house! Though knowing my daughter-in-law's affinity for gray, this is likely the one my granddaughter will be sleeping on too the next time they visit...till its dirty, then grandma gets to put the pink one on :)
customer_reviews.author: queenme

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it unless you just want a regular sheet
customer_reviews.text: Fits my graco pac n play a little loose but not so loose its unsafe or a problem. The problem is its not very padded at all. It's just as hard with or without the sheet.
customer_reviews.author: Dessy

product_meta.title: Graco Pack 'n Play Quilted Playard Sheet, Stone Gray
product_meta.description:
Color:Stone GrayUsing a graco pack 'n play quilted playard sheet is smart, creating an environment that's exceptionally safe, clean and comfortable. With simply soft material, the sheet helps create a soft nest for your baby to rest and play. The sheet is machine washable, which makes keeping your playard clean and fresh easy and hassle-free.

BRAND STORY
By Graco
feature_bullets: Soft, quilted sheet provides comfortable play and sleeping space wherever you take your Pack 'n Play
Playard sheets are convenient and attractively colored
Measuring 27 by 39 inches, the sheet fits most playards
Machine wash, No bleach and tumble dry for hassle-free cleaning
New simply soft. fabric is quilted for extra comfort, creating a cozy place for baby
Playard sheets help create an ever-fresh nest for your baby and convenience for you--simply machine wash and tumble dry
Measuring 27" x 39", the sheet fits most playards so baby can have a snug, clean and secure place to rest

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars2,365 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
